items.sentence: Tom said I could leave early if I wanted to.
Tom asked Mary where she'd bought her cello.
Yesterday, I was told not to worry about it.
I want to live here for the rest of my life.
This is the last time we'll have to do this.
If you wait a few minutes, I'll go with you.
Will all these books fit into your backpack?
Tom will probably be at the conference, too.
Please pay attention to what Tom has to say.
I suspect Tom's opinion is the same as ours.
Would you like to go out to dinner sometime?
Have you ever tried chugging coffee creamer?
Do you prefer the blue ones or the red ones?
I'm phoning to make an appointment with you.
I've torn up all the letters you've written.
My wife's parents didn't attend our wedding.
I don't think I know anybody in these parts.
This is the goose that lays the golden eggs.
Nobody has more respect for women than I do.
Are you and Tom planning on getting married?
